attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I urge the government to re-open the coal mines and to use the coal to make man made gas. Once in operation it will give a plentiful and cheaper gas supply to the population at large.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
